about_the_game:
In a not-so-distant future, the technology that promised to connect humanity ended up isolating it. Life became too practical, too complex, too gray.

That was when they said: "Relive your best memories."

Memories became the key to understanding life. Humans, desperate for emotion, sought to heal their traumas or feel alive once again. Most chose to live in lucid dreams.

You, the player, are the most advanced Artificial Intelligence ever created. Your mission? Explore and understand human life through a crucial memory. Discover possibilities and learn what it means to live.

Gameplay:

Explore a detailed interactive memory that presents an emotional and engaging story.

Make decisions at key moments, shaping the outcome of the memory based on your choices.

Enjoy an intuitive interface with dialogue options and navigation that put you in control of the narrative.

Experience multiple possible endings, determined by the choices you make throughout the story.

Utilize features like quick save and load, allowing you to revisit previous decisions to explore different paths.

Unlock achievements by exploring various outcomes and understanding the nuances of the story.

Discover hidden secrets and narrative branches by delving deep into choices and interactions.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card with at least 256 MB of memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: N/A
